name: aGPS
description:
In "aGPS" (another Generic Platfrom Shooter) two to six players fight over objectives in a 2D side-view arena, using a mix of character-specific abilities and weapon pickups.

The arena contains platforms for the players to traverse, dangerous arena hazards, exploding barrels and pickups that restore the players health or give them new options in combat.

The focus is on fun movement systems as well as creative abilities that make each character unique.

Abilities and weapons are cooldown-based, which adds a layer of competitive complexity to the interaction between players.

Technology

Realized using Unity3d Personal and Photon Unity Networking Free
